hero.title: Umhlinzeki Wesevisi Yokwakha Nokuphinda Kulungiswe
hero.subtitle: Asikhombi nje ngobuhle; sikumayelana nokudala isisekelo esiphelelayo, esihlakaniphile futhi esibukekayo sembonakalo yangaphakathi nangaphandle.

about.title: Ukubuka Ibhizinisi
about.description: I-Kanguya builders yaqala njengabasebenzi abajwayelekile bekhontraktha ngo-2010 eKapa, eNingizimu Afrika, yathatha amaphrojekthi amancane okwakha eKapa. Kusukela ngo-2010-2018, i-Kanguya builders yayaziwa ngokuthi iTrust Builders. Ekupheleni kuka-2018, i-Kanguya builders yafudukela eZambia lapho yathatha amaphrojekthi amaningi okwakha yashintsha igama layo lafuya i-Kanguya Builders eLusaka kuze kube ngu-2021. Ngo-2022, sabuyela eKapa, eNingizimu Afrika lapho sazisekela ngokuphelele njengabadlali abanamandla embonini yokwakha, sithatha amaphrojekthi amancane naphakathi, senza imisebenzi yokuphatha amaphrojekthi, sinikeza amasevisi amahle, futhi sinikeza izixazululo zobunjiniyela bezemabhizinisi kumakhasimende ethu.
about.visionText: Ukuba ngabakhathi bokwakha abahlonitshwayo futhi sinikeze ngaphezu kwalokho okulindelekile ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi sifake isandla ohlelweni lokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda ye-Afrika futhi sidlale indima yokudala amathuba emisebenzi entsheni yase-Afrika.

philosophyPoints.safety: Ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha nendawo yokusebenza efanele endaweni ngaso sonke isikhathi
philosophyPoints.planning: Ukudala ishedyuli enemininingwane kanye nohlelo lwezinsiza ukuhlangabezana nezinhloso zamakhasimende ethu
philosophyPoints.communication: Ukuxhumana nsuku zonke nabo bonke ababambiqhaza ephrojekthini

services.title: Amasevisi Ethu Okwakha
services.subtitle: Izixazululo eziphelele zokwakha nokuphinda kulungiswe ngolwazi lweminyaka eyi-14+
services.tilingDesc: Ukufakwa kwamathayili ngchwebo phansi, ezindongeni nasezifinyezweni
services.brickworkDesc: Ukwakha izitina zekhwalithi ukuze kusetshenziswe kusakhiwo nasebuhleni
services.paintingDesc: Amasevisi okupenda ngaphakathi naphandle ngokuphela okukahle

costEstimator.title: Ithuluzi Lokulinganisa Izindleko
costEstimator.subtitle: Thola isilinganiso esifanele sephrojekthi yakho yokwakha. Faka imininingwane yephrojekthi yakho lapha ukuze uthole isilinganiso esiseduze ngokususelwa emalini ethu amanje.
costEstimator.projectDetailsDesc: Nikeza ulwazi lwephrojekthi yakho ukuze ulinganise izindleko
costEstimator.basic: Isisekelo - Izinto zokwakha ezivamile nokuklama okulula
costEstimator.standard: Okuvamile - Izinto zekhwalithi ephezulu nobunzima obuphakathi
costEstimator.estimateDesc: Isibali sethu sezindleko sinikeza izilinganiso eziyisisekelo ngokusekelwe ku:
costEstimator.importantNote: Okubalulekile: Lesi isilinganiso esiseduze. Izindleko zokugcina zingahluka ngokusekelwe ezimfunweni ezithile, izimo zendawo, ukukhetha izinto, namanani emakethe amanje. Sixhumane nathi ukuze uthole isilinganiso esinomelakubone.
costEstimator.contactDesc: Sixhumane nathi ukuze uthole isilinganiso esinomelakubone kanye nokuceluleka kochwepheshe

contact.title: Sixhumane Nathi
contact.subtitle: Thintana nathi ngezidingo zakho zokwakha nokuphinda kulungiswe
contact.name: Igama Eliphelele
contact.subject: Isihloko

footer.description: Siyakwamukela ku-Kanguya Builders, umthombo owethembekile wamasevisi okwakha nokuphinda kulungiswe akhwalithi ephezulu. Ngolwazi olungaphezu kweminyaka eyi-14 embonini yokwakha, siziqhenya kakhulu ngokuletha izixazululo ezingenaso iphambeko.
